metadata.title: CVE-2017-0495 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Mediaserver could enable a localmalicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. Thisissue is rated as Moderate because it could be used to access sensitivedata without permission. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0,7.1.1. Android ID: A-33552073.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
